DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Global Health Version 1.1 Global03 General Rating Physical Health Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of their physical health in general, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Global Health Domain In General How Would You Rate Your Physical Health Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses overall health in general, including global ratings of the five primary PROMIS domains (physical function, fatigue, pain, emotional distress, social health) as well as perceptions of general health that cut across domains._A question about an individual's rating of their physical health._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses overall health in general, including global ratings of the five primary PROMIS domains (physical function, fatigue, pain, emotional distress, social health) as well as perceptions of general health that cut across domains.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses overall health in general, including global ratings of the five primary PROMIS domains (physical function, fatigue, pain, emotional distress, social health) as well as perceptions of general health that cut across domains.

Property.preferredName: In General How Would You Rate Your Physical Health Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A person's rating of their physical health.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: In General How Would You Rate Your Physical Health
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's rating of their physical health.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PROMIS General Health Rating Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS Global Health items that describes a range of subjective scores for rating health in general from 1: Poor, to 5: Excellent.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Link to PROMIS Assessment Center for additional information and scoring.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
